website_summaries.verdict: This fat separator has plenty of versatility, as it will work equally well with hot or cold liquids.
pros: Container has 4 cups of capacity, so it works nicely for a busy kitchen
Offers a high quality, heat resistant plastic construction that will not leak while straining liquids
BPA-free plastic included in the separator
All parts of this product are dishwasher safe for easy cleanup
cons: Price is a little higher than some others
Large unit can be difficult to store

customer_reviews.title: Works well in a way that I did not anticipate
customer_reviews.text: I discovered that I could use the fat separator to neatly dispense chicken stock into ice trays with precision. This ability alone was worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen R. Small

customer_reviews.title: Great performance . . . until it started leaking
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well . . . the first five or six times. Now, the plug doesn't seat adequately in the drain hole, causing continual leakage. Having noted its all-plastic construction, I have only hand-washed the pieces in warm water. There is nothing to adjust that would remediate the problem, as far as I can see. I would estimate the downward force on the stopper to be far less than an ounce and insufficient to force stopper to occlude the drain hole. Sad, because during its brief utility it handily surpassed my previous version (with the spout).
customer_reviews.author: rjm1604

customer_reviews.title: Leaks after first use, no cracks and is intact, but fails.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, during the first use (straining out fat from gallons of stock), the seal at the bottom no longer would plug the hole and it leaks :( I read over so many reviews and as the majority were positive, bought this item a few months ago after a last round of stock making, so I wouldn't use it until it was time to make stock again. Unfortunately, the first time I was able to try it out, it failed, and I'm outside of the return window. I am an avid review reader and this is the first time I've had a product fail on me after doing my research ahead of time, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Malia S.

customer_reviews.title: where this one is easily cleaned. It appears to be a match for ...
customer_reviews.text: Most fat separators require you to carefully pour the contents of the separated liquid from a a long spout, watching carefully to see when the separation line hits the spout. This unit allows one to drain from the bottom and provides a clearer view of the contents. Most significantly, long spouts are difficult to clean, where this one is easily cleaned. It appears to be a match for others sold under a variety of names but with matching pictures. At the price point with the added "bonus," it's a better buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Bill

customer_reviews.title: I didn't know something like this existed and was very excited to see it ...
customer_reviews.text: I saw this type of fat separator on Cooks Country America's Test Kitchen being used in a recipe. I didn't know something like this existed and was very excited to see it in action. I am impressed with the quality of this product and am looking forward to making bone broth, stews, and paleo gravies without the hassle and mess of trying to get the majority of the fat out. This product will strain as well as separate the liquid with a no mess and no fuss approach. Wonderful! Thank you for a great product! Jackie
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Turns out it's junk. Worked 3 times before seal failed and is now worthless. Peeler broke the second time it was used. They were nice enough to send me a new one, saying that the one I received was a "lemon", but the second one worked just like the first, started leaking after the third use, had to get rid of that one too.
customer_reviews.author: Frank & Heather Monahan

customer_reviews.title: Well made and efficient/easy fat separator!
customer_reviews.text: I found this fat separator through a recommendation made on America's Test Kitchen. I had always wanted a fat separator, and the design of this model made a lot of sense, so I ordered it. The delivery was quick and ideal. The product arrived before I would be making a huge Christmas Eve dinner. This product made those last frantic moments before serving the meal SO MUCH easier, and the gravy was thee very best I had ever made. I felt good knowing that I had been able to EASILY remove the fat from the turkey droppings. I've not used the free gift of the peeler, yet, but it appears to be well made and very functional. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Love this product but...
customer_reviews.text: I make gravy for Thanksgiving dinner & have used different grease separators over the years but this is so superior that I now use it when I make chicken soup or stock to cook with. Unfortunately, I have a slight crack in the plastic & the silicone drip plug doesn't fit in so well & it leaks. Great product but I do wish it had lasted more than a year plus 23 days. PS the strainer is another wonderful feature.
customer_reviews.author: Dottyw

customer_reviews.title: Defective, leaking disappointing purchase
customer_reviews.text: This product leaked and broke immediately first time using it and followed the instructions to a tee. Perhaps I’m just an unlucky customer who got a defected product however I didn’t see how I could return it after I used it. Very disappointed and will not be buying from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Fell Apart second time I used it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 3 months ago, used it the first time it was fine, tried to use it the second time and it fell apart. I have tried over and over again to put it back together but the black plastic handle/button cover will not stay in place. I do not see any tabs on it so not sure how it was held in place to begin with. I handwashed it after the first use so they cannot blame it on the dishwasher. Of course I am outside of the return window so I paid $22 for 1 time use. Definitely keep scrolling and find a better/different design.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Caraway

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this a few times and it did work perfectly. My only concern is that the release arm doesn’t seem that strong and I don’t know if it will last but for now much better design than pour spouts. I purchased in April, 2018. Update as of 11/2018, plastic cracked and no longer holds liquid. Great design , poor production. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: tamarra b

customer_reviews.title: It worked once
customer_reviews.text: It's not effective for stocks that are gelatinous, and you'll need to use a second strainer to catch any fine or mid-size particles. It also doesn't work with hot stocks - the plastic warped just enough that it wouldn't form a seal after my first use. My second try I poured the stock in ... and it flowed right out the bottom. And since the spigot is at the bottom of the pot you can't even use it as a regular container. It went from my kitchen to the recycling bin.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cain

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until it started leaking.
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for about five uses and then started leaking badly. Before it started leaking it was amazing. I make stock pretty regularly and this worked perfectly to help keep as much fat out of the final product as possible. With the old style of separators with the spout at the bottom of the container I always still had a bit of fat in the spout that would work it’s way into the final stock. Really disappointed that this wasn’t as reliable as it should have been.
customer_reviews.author: hconn21

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The stopper for the container doesn’t lift up sufficiently to allow the liquid to easily drain and I was unwilling to try to bend the plastic arm because the stopper doesn’t fit snuggly-if the arm were bent wrong, the stopper wouldn’t work at all. Felt flimsy & was returned
customer_reviews.author: Robbie Perry

customer_reviews.title: Not worth owning
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it a zero I would. #1 it's not leak proof as it's claims. #2 it's not heat resistant ither as it claims! I make a lot of bone broth and thought this would save some time. I let my broth cool off for 30 minutes after I had removed most of the vegetables and bones. Then I started packing my broth into this unit. I got almost 2 full cups into this "thing" before I noticed it was leaking all over my counter!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Needs work
customer_reviews.text: Mine cracked or was sent cracked...not sure but wasn't dropped or anything. This's should come with some kind of base and perhaps a different lid since you can't microwave for reheating and because the gravy Comes out the bottom and it gets greasy everytime you serve gravy. You need to put a plate under it. It's a great product in many ways but could be better and clearly not made well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inventive solution; Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. The fact that only the top strainer is dishwasher proof is a bit of a bummer which caused me to downgrade the "Easy to clean" to 4 stars. The numbers on the side are also a bit difficult to read. For my purposes this doesn't matter. I haven't used the separator long enough to rate its "sturdiness" over the long haul but it is solidly put together and easy to take apart for cleaning. I also like the ease with which I can separate the fat. Much better than my bottom pour spout separator and much easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: TJay

customer_reviews.title: I believed all the great reviews...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this, but returning my 2nd one now. First one was set on my counter after I poured in broth, and leaked all over my counter. I rewashed it and tried to see if the plug needed readjusting, but the rubber was just not fitting well. Returned. 2nd one worked great the first time, and after that never worked again. Breaks my heart.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for Thanksgiving but I have cleaned it well already and it’s easy to do. It has a wide opening to pour liquid in and a strainer on the top. Great product! The pealing device isn’t worth the packaging. I appreciate the extra “gift” but when you try to use it, it just spins! Perhaps I’m doing something wrong.
customer_reviews.author: mj k

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Junk
customer_reviews.text: Threw it in the trash. Leaked while sitting on the counter & created a mess for cleanup. Don't waste your money. And yes the stopper was in place.
customer_reviews.author: jshtarp

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as needed!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool! We culture kefir to a very thick "yogurt" consistency where the whey will settle to the bottom of the thickened yogurt. We used to spend a good deal of time and effort skimming and attempting to leave the whey behind. Now, using this great separator it's a simple push of a button -- done! Oh, by the way, if you are one of those folks who has to wash everything right away, this is one item you leave assembled until everything is out -- do not take the top apart with anything left in -- it will find its way to the counter top or the floor! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Scott

customer_reviews.title: Fat separator
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I envisioned it to be. I chose this one because of affordability. I live on a fixed income and could not afford the one recommended by my favorite TV show. However, the design is the same, the operation is the same, AND I could afford to buy it without going without something else this month! I do not like single use devices, so I plan to use this "separator" to make pancakes, crepes, funnel cakes, etc. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean/Don't waste the $
customer_reviews.text: The purpose of this item is to separate grease from gravy but it is not dishwasher proof!! Time saved from using it is more than lost lost in trying to clean the grease. Washed with Dawn and hot water twice and still greasy. Now soaking for third attempt. Do people who design/sell these things test them or even cook?
customer_reviews.author: charlieg

customer_reviews.title: Stopper on bottom doesn't stopper, leaks everything out in a minute, all over counter
customer_reviews.text: Tried to use this to separate for broth, turned back in a minute and all the good stuff is all over the counter and floor. Tried to fill with warm water and soap, it leaks as fast as the faucet on 1/4 Also didn't seem to come clean easily, no idea on that one, it's just plastic, maybe I was impatient after spending so long messing with the stopper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, made the best gravy ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was hosting thanksgiving dinner and my gravy generally sucks because I don’t know how to use the fat separator right. This made it so easy, my mother in law was raving about how much simpler this was, how she was going to get one, etc. we made, hands down, the best gravy we’ve ever made or had. It was perfect, it took minutes, it was so easy to use and clean. I’m so glad I bought this
customer_reviews.author: Daina Agostina

customer_reviews.title: A must have addition to your kitchen equipment.
customer_reviews.text: Just when I thought I had everything I possibly needed in my kitchen I found this. I couldn't be more pleased with it. It is very easy to use, clean and store. I love the 4 cup size. I have used it for straining and separating fat from a slow cooked pork shoulder, though I did use a piece of cheesecloth atop the strainer to filter more finely. I also used it to drain away the watery portion of chilled coconut milk, leaving just the coconut cream on top. The peeler was a nice bonus. I plan to buy several as gifts .
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H. Raffel

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t catch fat as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product after I pressure cookEd a boneless pork shoulder. I strained all the juices into the separator but I’m not sure if it work as intended. The holes in the plastic strainer are small enough to stop the meat. This separated the meat & juices but not the ‘fat’, so much. The natural juices & fat did not seem to separate in the container as hoped. I thought there might be a ‘finer’ filter screen included, to catch the fat.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This was life changing haha. My kids laughed at how excited I was as I was using it. It works like it should and I love that it comes apart easy for cleaning. I also like the large size. I use it for all my soups to separate the day. This is actually one of my favorite purchases in a long while.. The bonus peeler is also awesome! I stopped using my other peeler because this one works so good Thank you!!!!
customer_reviews.author: GmrMom

customer_reviews.title: Sure beats the old spout-at-the-bottom design
customer_reviews.text: The item I purchased (4qt. fat separator) arrived quickly and exactly as described. It appears to be made of high-quality materials. I have not used it for cooking yet, but it's obvious to see that it will work better than the old bottom-spout models, which are never useful if you're separating small quantities. It's easy to see that won't be a factor with this one. an initial test with hot water confirmed that the seal at the bottom is firm and does not leak. Additionally, the seller sent an informative email the day before the package was delivered AND enclosed a thoughtful gift in the package. Terrific item, terrific vendor!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Mowrey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a fat separator, this is the one you want! Excellent customer service, and an even better product! The separator was larger than I expected (this is a GOOD thing!), and is easy and simple to use. Not messy at all, and you can get every last drop of broth out, without the fat mixing in! Hand wash this, it isn’t that difficult, and hand washing will preserve the integrity of the seal at the bottom. The seller was quite pleasant to work with, I look forward to buying more from them!
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: I only use this when I smoke a brisket and it is so nice to be able to remove the fat juice from the good when I'm going to drizzle it back on the brisket after slicing it. The nipple portion is a little harder to clean because of how small it is. I usually let my wife clean it as I'm sure I'd break it. Otherwise I really like it and how simple it is to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Stopper does'nt open enough for thicker liquid
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the looks of this item. although I do occasionally use things like this to strain juices , the main thing I like to use these for is pancake and waffle batter.. There in was the problem... the stopper at the bottom did't open wide enough for the batters to flow out.. I was really sad that I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy J.

customer_reviews.title: Best I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this gravy separator! I have bought other styles that either didn’t work very well or were hard to clean. This separates the dripping from the fat so easily and hold a large amount of drippings. It cleans very easy and quickly too. The strainer on the top is so helpful with the bits you don’t want in drippings like bay leaves or garlic cloves. My only little gripe is the red PLASTIC button that releases the drippings. Wish it was a heavy duty plastic or even metal. I worry it might break off and then it’s useless. I use the red button very gently.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great tool to deal as you wish with the "aftermath" ...
customer_reviews.text: A great tool to deal as you wish with the "aftermath" of your cooking. Do you want the pan juices, braising liquids for additional flavor in your dish ? This device allows YOU to control the fat content of the above things. Fat floats above lighter liquids. This tool will help with gravies, sauces and other liquids you want in your completed dish to augment its flavor profile. Read the simple instructions for any precautions about product care. The seller is very diligent with e-mail follow-up. I haven't yet had the opportunity to use this item, but I'm sure it will function as described. Happy cooking !
customer_reviews.author: L C H

customer_reviews.title: Quality Not There!
customer_reviews.text: The product cracked on the bottom near the hole that releases the liquid after a couple of uses. Very disappointed in quality...I've order the oxy, I hope the durability will be better.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia P.

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: The 1st one I bought worked great the 1st use - but after that it leaked terrible. The company replaced it immediately at no cost to me and the 2nd one has worked great for months now. I use it to drain some of the fat off home made bone broth but it could be used for anything - fat rises to the top and you release non-fat product from the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: sheryl ck

customer_reviews.title: Great seperator. Wish they also made a half sized one.
customer_reviews.text: Well, this thing works well for me. I do think the stopper could be a little heavier. I would also never use it on the table, you are just asking for someone to jiggle the thumb knob too soon and make a mess, plus the bottom will be messy after some comes out. Me, I only use it in the sink. The top is a nice filter and once things separate, you get all the good stuff from below really fast and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy Old Man

customer_reviews.title: what is this
customer_reviews.text: no separation of liquid happens, it all leaks out the bottom no instructions of how to use it. so it sits in the cupboard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked for less than a year
customer_reviews.text: This fat separator worked great at first. After nine months it started to leak. I took it completely apart, cleaned it, then reassembled it. checking with a high intensity light, I found that the round bullet shaped seal was no longer centered on the drain whole. It is off by about 1/32 ". So, fluid just runs tight through it. It is no longer useable. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: once the stopper gets greasy it no long stops the flow at 100%
customer_reviews.text: the stopper does not completely close once you have started letting the liquid out. So make sure you have something to catch the small amount that falls once you have closed the plunger. I can be frustrating to take apart, because the outside can become greasy. It can also me hard to see the layer of grease, depending on your site.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made product
customer_reviews.text: this item didn't last 3 weeks before it leaked, cracked and had to be tossed in a landfill. I will say that the company did reach out and refunded my money which was very gracious.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Conrath

customer_reviews.title: Great when it works until it doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: A very convenient and easy to use time saver for a household that cooks a great deal. After using this for a week or so, I found it so useful that I ordered another for my brother. Unfortunately, after using about a dozen times, the silicone plug won't hold and now it leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Bad execution for a great idea
customer_reviews.text: The bottom will crack and you'll find the contents all over your counter. I tried, twice, and with the same result both times. Don't bother, it's very poorly constructed.
customer_reviews.author: deuxbebes

customer_reviews.title: Leaky
customer_reviews.text: The first couple of times I used it, this fat separator worked perfectly. I like that it drains the liquid out from under the floating fat. However, the rubber plug is no longer properly seating inside the bottom hole, making the separator leak profusely. I've fiddled as much as I dare, but it's still not plugging the hole. I did put the clear bottom part (but not the plug/handle assembly, which screws off) through the dishwasher, on the top rack, before realizing you're not supposed to. I can't imagine that would've caused it to change shape so much it no longer works, though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not that great - Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: The bottom plug does not function well when you pour liquids in that are very hot. It’s also very difficult to know when you reach the oil and even when you do release the handle, liquid still leaks out so it’s very messy. Save your money and just get a conventional oil depressor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this fat separator. I've used it for both Thanksgiving and Christmas. The little strainer on the top is great for catching any big bits. I love that it's dishwasher safe (other than the top piece). It's very easy to wash and reassemble. I'm happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: tfkent

customer_reviews.title: Good product but don't get it for the bonus veggie peeler
customer_reviews.text: Product works as advertised. It's sturdy and easy to clean. The veggie peeler sounds like a great idea but it's silly and doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: boom

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: The separator itself is great and works perfectly, 5 stars. 0 stars for the bonus vege peeler since it broke the first time I used it on a potato.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie P

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and product
customer_reviews.text: This product really does what it says. I had zero leaks and it's so easy to take apart and clean. It's nice to be able to have an easy way to degrease liquids or broths. I highly recommend this product. I had a slight issue with the delivery but customer service was fabulous. I will definitely buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Lhaynes

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful. It was quick, easy, not the least bit frustrating! I had two days of back-to-back dinners with gravy. First time I used the ice cube method, really tedious. The second meal, I ignored the gravy because I wasn't willing to do the ice cubes again! I didn't have the time to deal with the separating. The next day I ordered your gravy separator. Fast forward to my next meal with gravy. I used your separator. In less than a minute, I had gravy I could use as it was or thicken. Loved it. I'm sold!
customer_reviews.author: MANNE

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I ruined mine though. I misread the directions and washed the strainer AND the handle in the dishwasher. The handle is not dishwasher safe because the red plug assembly shrank and wouldn’t seal anymore. The first time I used it, it worked like a champ. If you want to use it more than once, don’t wash the handle and plug assembly in the dishwasher 😣
customer_reviews.author: SNjunky

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I finally got around to using this fat strainer, which is vastly superior to my old strainer with a spout. The button allowing liquid to drain from the bottom is easy to use and the polycarbonate plastic lets me see when to stop (the fat floats atop the other liquid). Seems sturdy enough but lack the hands-on experience to say that it will last. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mom whose son likes to cook

customer_reviews.title: Good design, possible bad materials for the stopper?
customer_reviews.text: Works great at separating liquid but it leaks slightly. When I received my seperator the stopper had some clearly visible fuzz on it, maybe left over from manufacturing? when I wiped the fuzz off gently with a paper towel the stopper started flaking off onto the towel enough that it was full of red flecks of silicone or whatever the stopper was made of.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Abrahamson

customer_reviews.title: Making gravy is so easy now.
customer_reviews.text: I love this separator. I used mine twice, once at Thanksgiving, and the two daughters were there and loved it too so I bought one for each of them. They were very happy when they received them. Making gravy and sauces is so much easier now. The quality is excellent. Using very hot water with your detergent is the key to cleaning it. Worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon C.

customer_reviews.title: Zero stars.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! The button to release gravy would not work! I emailed the supplier and they said they would replace. Not to send it back. Still no replacement!! I should have sent it back via Amazon. Now it’s too late. DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Blattner

customer_reviews.title: It’s nice
customer_reviews.text: This is so much better than the angled spout separator we had. It’s thicker plastic, and super simple to use. It’s made good gravy and turkey broth so far. I imagine it’ll do it’s job for as long as I’m willing to keep cooking.
customer_reviews.author: jmerc

customer_reviews.title: It Leaks
customer_reviews.text: It does accomplish what it has been designed for but if the hot liquid is left in the container for more than a few seconds it tends to leak from the bottom oriface. If not using all of the liquid immediately it is best to find another container to retain the unused portion.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Herrmann

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrible. It leaks, it’s difficult to clean, and the clear plastic cup part cracked the second time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best separator ever!
customer_reviews.text: I finally used it today and must say it IS the best separator I've ever used. I hope it lasts. The seal was solid, no leaking, even after activating it numerous times it still held. Thank you, I look forward to many years of use. As for durability, I just got it so too soon to say definitively but it appears it should last quite some time. Thanks. RM
customer_reviews.author: yourobli

customer_reviews.title: Leaks. There's a big crack where the plug goes.
customer_reviews.text: Havn't used this much, and its already broken, leaking everywhere. The plug section has a weakened seams that allows this to be quite fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Ato

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Used twice. First time worked great second time not so much. Bottom of container started to leak due to a crack. If not for the defective container it would be a nice product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slow Flow
customer_reviews.text: This thing is virtually useless. The stopper hardly comes from from the bottom hole at all, so there is almost no flow from the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Doak Procter

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works great but not so easy to clean due to hard to access all inside areas. I failed to read all the directions and didn't realize that the bottom unscrews from the unit making it easy to clean. Given this I'm changing my review to five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mixon M.

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: I have had this a short time and used only once but it is a game changer for me. I like to make my own chicken and beef stock, can my own soup etc and it was such a hassle to put it in the fridge, wait for the fat to solidify and then use. With this I just let the stock cool down a little, pour in and let it work its magic. So fast and easy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as the one that America's Test Kitchen recommended as being the best fat separator
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as the one that America's Test Kitchen recommended as being the best fat separator. It looks [and works] exactly the same, except for a different brand name. Plus, the versatile peeler/julienne tool is a welcome bonus & addition to my arsenal of kitchen gadgets. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Peter LTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Leaks out the bottom. Burned myself.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this the first time I used. I hand washed, put it back in the box. Used it today again. Filled it up, everything was fine. Let some broth out and put the cup back down. The hole never plugged back up and hot broth leaked everywhere, including my hand and leg burning it. So not worth it. I tried washing it, and it won’t ecen hold water at this point, even with me making sure the plug is lined up. Waste of money and I’m very disappointed after seeing so many good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Vals07

customer_reviews.title: LEAKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked OK the first 4 or 5 times. Next time leaked chicken broth on the counter, down the cabinet doors and onto the floor. Not fun to clean up. Reached out to seller via their web-site with no response. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: sherlock

customer_reviews.title: A company that stands by there product.
customer_reviews.text: I love my fat separator it worked awesome and just after the return date my fat separator was leaking there the bottom hole. Well I contacted the seller and Carrie respond to me very quickly explaining that even though the return date as passed she still offered me a replacement or a full refund. Only a quality Company would stand up to there products. I kindly excepted a replacement an I am patiently wzz a sting for its arrival. Thank you Carrie love doing busy with you. Thank Robert Viola
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This gravy separator is a great item. My husband loves gravy and this makes so much sense. Also clean up is a breeze. Why didn't someone think of this before. Bonus is the peeler which is top of the line. Never had a peeler that made quick work out of peeling anything. We dried apples recently and it saved so much time. Would love to get more for kids and friends. 5 stars for both items.
customer_reviews.author: Jacci Heuberger

customer_reviews.title: Must have if you ever separate fat
customer_reviews.text: It's a simple device, but super effective. Pour the drippings in the top, it strains out the big chunks, let it sit for a minute to separate, then drop the good stuff out of the bottom. So easy, I wish I had it sooner instead of all the old methods of using a turkey baster or spoon to get the fat out.
customer_reviews.author: Livigs

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with it's intended use to be for making stock, which it's great for. I hate not using a tool for more than one thing so I'll try it with a thin pancake batter next. I don't like thick pancakes so it should work great for this too. Has never leaked when it's had liquid in it so it's worth the money. Stop, start, still no dripping. Seals tightly.
customer_reviews.author: TerryG

customer_reviews.title: Gravy & Fat Separator
customer_reviews.text: So far, I'm very pleased with this gravy/fat separator. Making bone broth and lots of soups, this is an excellent tool for me to use. I've had no problems with leakage and like the design. It's been used several times weekly since I purchased and very pleased. Easy to clean too!
customer_reviews.author: Trala

customer_reviews.title: It’s Great!
customer_reviews.text: This gravy separator is awesome. The size is perfect and it is just what I wanted. The sellers have done a great job of being in touch with me so I’m sure if I ran into any issues the would help me out. But for now, I’m loving it! Cooking is becoming so fun when I have great tools like this!
customer_reviews.author: Northwoods  Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We were a bit skeptical about this but when our classic gravy separator broke right before thanksgiving, this was the one available for next day delivery. Turns out this works surprisingly well and we love it. Highly recommenced
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C.

customer_reviews.title: Quite a handy product
customer_reviews.text: The fat separator works as it's supposed to. I like that it pours from the bottom and doesn't use a spout. I always end up dribbling a little bit. Initially, I feared the 4 cup capacity was too big. but when I used it to collect the liquid from making 5 pounds of shredded beef, it turned out to be the perfect size. A couple tips. When I first opened the bottom, I noticed very little was coming out. I gave it the slightest tap to disrupt any sediment and the problem was solved. Also, after pouring out liquid, you may want to put a paper towel underneath it, as there may be a droplet or 2 on the opening.
customer_reviews.author: erickson598

customer_reviews.title: So much better than the spout one
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 2 months before Thanksgiving and they kept asking me for a review. I kept telling them that I hadn't used it yet. Well I have and I love it! Had the original style for years and hated how grease got into my drippings and a pain to clean. This is wonderful. You have total control and cleanup is a breeze. I made pot roast last week just to use it again.
customer_reviews.author: maggi

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes all you want is something that does one thing ...
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes all you want is something that does one thing and does it well. In this case it was a 2 for 1 deal and I received two things that do their job well. The gravy separator separates, the peeler peels. What more could a cook want?
customer_reviews.author: Early Adapter

customer_reviews.title: Almost...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this type of fat separator, but with a glass body, so it wouldn't crack. The bottom valve is excellent, but though the claim was that it could withstand very hot stock, it is not the case. I always wait a while before pouring for some cool down, but still it cracked within a few uses. Disappointing. I wish somebody would make one of these with tempered glass.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Greatest fat separator. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this gizmo. If I wasn't happily married, I'd ditch the wife and propose to little Miss Best 4 Cup (the wife only has 2 cups, but lucky for her I'm not a Neanderthal). It actually motivates me to make my own chicken stock more frequently, since I get to use little Miss Best 4 Cup every time. Effortless to use & easy to clean. I didn't assign a durability rating since I've only had mine for about six months. So far, so great!
customer_reviews.author: Sep

customer_reviews.title: Works great when separating foamy drinks and smoothies
customer_reviews.text: When I make smoothies, I whip in a lot of air (normal) and when using dairy, this makes foam. In general, I have digestion problems lots of foam/gas, so using this, and letting sit for 15-20 min, I can drain off the smoothie liquid to drink. Perfect! I leave the foam in the container and put in the fridge to settle overnight for a milky protein-y eye opener couple of gulps.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have used a couple of times . Great product! Love it. Easy to use and does what it is suppose to do. I would't hesitate to get an other or to recomend it.
customer_reviews.author: agatha christie lover

customer_reviews.title: price and quality
customer_reviews.text: price and quality were the decision maker, easy to use just as listed. I always slow cook pork butts and the broth left in the pot needed to be chilled to remove the fat ( lard ). Now its as easy as pushing a button , the broth drains out and the fats can be safely disposed .
customer_reviews.author: John Childress

customer_reviews.title: Gravy Separator leaked after second use all over counter
customer_reviews.text: We had only used this twice. On the second use it leaked all over the counter top and made a mess. The grease leaked right past the stopper. It does not seal properly. We cleaned it and it still leaked. I question whether this product went thru durability testing. Very dissappointed.
customer_reviews.author: James W. Dunham

customer_reviews.title: It Works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use the 4 cup fat separator today while making my gravy for my Thanksgiving dinner and I have to say it worked flawlessly. I would definitely buy it again if something happens to the one I have. It’s a keeper. Thank you for such a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: PA

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: It took me a few minutes to figure out that it ALL comes apart for cleaning but it goes back together just as easy and really is a good tight seal in the hole where the broth comes out. It has made removing the fat from soups and broths so easy. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Trejo

customer_reviews.title: If it does well with boiling juices or should it cool down first? Ps. My vell pho
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to use it yet but it looks very well put together. As soon as I need to make gravy, I'll let you know.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Young

customer_reviews.title: Superior Product
customer_reviews.text: Superior Product! Perfect for making gravy! Bottom stopper is genius. When it arrived I thought I should have ordered the 2-cup. Then I used it for the first time to make gravy for a rib roast. The drippings almost filled the container. If I had gone with the smaller one it would have been too small!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have seen this on various advertisements and wanted one ...
customer_reviews.text: I have seen this on various advertisements and wanted one. Never could get the process down on the old style; however, with this style it is very simple and effective. Already used it once and it worked as promised.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Good for more than gravy
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Makes filling small vessels mess free. Separation of fat from cooking liquids and solids super efficient. Great for making perfect little pancakes. Really great product.
customer_reviews.author: Bizzybee

customer_reviews.title: Leaks out bottom unless setting on a bowl
customer_reviews.text: Fluid leaks out of bottom onto whatever surface its setting. Have to set it over bowl to catch drips. It does separate the oils, but the leak takes away the supposedly easy use.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy Grandpa

customer_reviews.title: holds a lot of gravy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself as a "pre-Thanksgiving" addition to my kitchen equipment. I love that it holds 4 cups of liquid, has a strainer and separates from the bottom. It is always awkward to have to tip out from a bottom syphon -- there is always some good stuff at the bottom. I have not used it with real gravy, but I did test it with hot water and oil and it worked just as designed!! Did not leak when the stopper was stopped up and let the water out while the oil sat on top.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best fat separator ever
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time on Friday to separate the fat 1from the turkey dripping to make gravy. Believe me, I was skeptical when I first looked at it, then when I ordered it, I wondered if I had made a nistakw. Well I didn’t. Wonderful product], easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Schnauzercloud

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with my separator
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my separator. I like the fact that there is a strainer on top to keep out large particles and the plug in the bottom to let out the fat. How easy is that? My only complaint is I did not receive the veggie peeler.
customer_reviews.author: Miztrial

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to and feels like it will last!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great I have used it multiple times and ran it through the dishwasher no problem. It's a great addition to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Alex McCarty

customer_reviews.title: It's good for separating
customer_reviews.text: The company sent me a replacement after I had a problem with the last one. This was unsolicited and I appreciate it. I have found the new one to not leak and perform as I had wanted
customer_reviews.author: EPS inc

customer_reviews.title: Not your granny's turkey baster!
customer_reviews.text: We tried a new Turkey recipe this Thanksgiving from Cooks Country and wanted a fat separator like the one used on the show--one that opens at the bottom and drains the juices without the fat. Neither my husband nor I had ever seen one that works so efficiently! This fat separator is great, even if we only use it once or twice per year. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: book lady

customer_reviews.title: Game changer for sauce making
customer_reviews.text: This is a game changer for making gravy and other sauces and straining broths. It has been a great go to tool in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: S. Crane

customer_reviews.title: Separates fat extremely well
customer_reviews.text: The gravy separator is a cool invention. It worked well for my use during the holidays when I cooked for more than 40 people. It took pretty hot water and dishwashing liquid to remove the fat residue. I’d give it 5 stars if cleaning it was easier.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Brookfield

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Just pour everything in and give it a minute. Fat will float to the top. It drains from the bottom. Gravy no fat. A healthier way to go
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long?
customer_reviews.text: I have needed this item for years, don't know why I waited so long. Removes grease and makes making gravy so much easier and healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Brown

product_meta.title: Fat Separator With Bottom Release - 4 Cup Gravy & Fat Separator with Strainer
product_meta.description:
Hate fat or lumps in your homemade gravy or sauces?
Looking for an easy way to remove pulp from your fruit juices?

GET THE VONDIOR NEWLY IMPROVED 4 CUP FAT SEPARATOR!

It’s redesigned with no spout to make healthier gravy, soups, stews, or sauces.

WHAT MAKES THE VONDIOR SEPARATOR UNIQUE?

NEWLY DESIGNED – Spoutless so never leaks & ease of use
QUALITY MATERIAL – Durable clear plastic bottom with black sturdy strainer & silicone plug
LARGE SIZE – Holds up to 4 Cups (32 Oz) with dimensions of 6.9” round & 5.9” tall 
CONVENIENT – Quickly strains without making a mess
CLEAR BASE – Measurements marked on bottom half 
ACCESS PLUG – Press red handle button to release filtered contents
STRAINS HOT & COLD FLUIDS – Heat & cold resistant plus BPA free
EASY TO CLEAN – Disassembled to 3 parts and top strainer is dishwasher safe.

PLUS FREE GIFT INCLUDED:
3-IN-1 PEELER – Made of stainless steel with an ergonomic handle, it peels, shaves, & slices with ease.

USE THE VONDIOR STRAINER FOR:
GRAVIES
SOUPS
STEWS
SAUCES
FRUIT JUICE

PACKAGE INCLUDES:
1 1L Cup with Strainer
1 Peeler
1 Instructions
1 Quality Gift Box – 8.5”x8.5”x6.5”

SATISFACTION GUARANTEE – Risk-Free!

Get your VONDIOR NEWLY IMPROVED NO SPOUT, LEAK-PROOF 4 CUP FAT STRAINER by clicking the ADD TO CART button.

It’s the perfect, practical gift for any cook!
feature_bullets: HEALTHIER MEALS QUICKLY: The VONDIOR FAT SEPERATOR is the perfect choice when making healthier gravies, soup, or sauces quickly and effortlessly; the 4 cup container comes in a gift box with instructions and 3-in-1 peeler bonus, ready for giving to moms, grandmothers, or cooks;

MULTIPLE USES AND EASY TO USE: The IMPROVED FAT SEPARATOR works with hot or cold fluids; separate the fat from the liquid when making gravy, soups, stews, or sauces or remove pulp from fruit juice quickly; the built-in strainer removes clumps, fat, thicker pieces, or pulp, leaving only fluid; when needed, just press the red button on the handle and the fluid drips out without containing unwanted pieces;

TOP QUALITY MATERIALS: Made of a leak-free clear plastic with plastic filter lid, the SPOUTLESS FAT SEPARATOR has a silicone drip plug for releasing liquids; the bottom has measurements for proper quantity; all parts are heat-resistant, BPA-free, and top shelf is dishwasher safe.

FREE PRODUCT: The VONDIOR SEPARATOR comes with Peeler that peels, shaves, and slices with a stainless steel blade and ergonomic handle; ideal for vegetables and fruits and is dishwasher safe; also added are instructions in a gift box that mothers, grandmothers, and professional chefs will repeatedly use and enjoy, wanting to create healthy, flavorful, delicious dishes

MANUFACTURERS GUARANTEED – Enjoy EVEO screen cleaner anytime you need, and feel free to contact us - we are available every day of the week for you! We stand behind the quality of our products, and that’s why we back our screen cleaner with our 3-Year Satisfaction – Manufacturer Guarantee.
